About Me

I’ve been interested in technology since high school. I love and enjoy creating designs, coding, and working with software and hardware configurations.

I’m continuously exploring the digital world, trying to adapt innovative technologies, challenging my creativity and strengthening my problem-solving skills in various IT operations.

Currently, I’m focused on web development, but I’m open and looking forward to opportunities where I can contribute with my technical skills to support a team’s success.
